column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ Â On the 5th of May
column5: a fire broke out at Lim Long Gas Station
column10: Phnom Penh.------ The fire started at 5 pm and took several hours to be brought under control. The fire caused damage to the gas station and destroyed five cars
column12: but did not spread to nearby homes. No casualties were reported.------The cause of the fire is being investigated
column13: but according to the preliminary report
column14: it was due to an electric fault when a tanker was offloading fuel. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/303794
